languages.text: "Я не просил ее отдавать тебя в мои руки — нет, это заставило бы мою бедную кузину лишь больше сомневаться в своих поступках. Я лишь указал ей, где искать следы ее мира-корабля, ответы на все ее вопросы — родственная услуга, не более. И подготовился к вашему прибытию — она не смогла бы попасть туда иначе, кроме как вместе с тобой".

traits.locale_text: "Я не просил ее отдавать тебя в мои руки — нет, это заставило бы мою бедную кузину лишь больше сомневаться в своих поступках. Я лишь указал ей, где искать следы ее мира-корабля, ответы на все ее вопросы. И подготовился к вашему прибытию — она не смогла бы попасть туда иначе, кроме как вместе с тобой".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "I did not ask her to hand you over to me — no, doing that would have made my poor cousin doubt herself even more than she was already. I simply told her where to seek out the traces of her craftworld, and the answers to her questions — a favour for a kinswoman, nothing more. And then I made ready for your arrival, for the only way she would reach that place was with you."
languages.original_text: "Я не просил ее отдавать тебя в мои руки — нет, это заставило бы мою бедную кузину лишь больше сомневаться в своих поступках. Я лишь указал ей, где искать следы ее мира-корабля, ответы на все ее вопросы — родственная услуга, не более. И подготовился к вашему прибытию — она не смогла бы попасть туда иначе, кроме как вместе с тобой".

And then I made ready for your arrival, for the only way she would reach that place was with you."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «No le pedí que te entregara a mí. Eso habría hecho que mi pobre prima dudara de sí misma más de lo que ya lo hacía. Solo le dije dónde podía buscar trazas de su mundo astronave y respuestas a sus preguntas... un favor a una pariente lejana, nada más. Y entonces me preparé para tu llegada, porque solo podría llegar a ese lugar con tu ayuda».
languages.original_text: "I did not ask her to hand you over to me — no, doing that would have made my poor cousin doubt herself even more than she was already. I simply told her where to seek out the traces of her craftworld, and the answers to her questions — a favour for a kinswoman, nothing more. And then I made ready for your arrival, for the only way she would reach that place was with you."

traits.locale_text: «No le pedí que te entregara a mí. Eso habría hecho que mi pobre prima dudara de sí misma más de lo que ya lo hacía. Solo le dije dónde podía buscar trazas de su mundo astronave y respuestas a sus preguntas... un favor a una pariente lejana, nada más. Y entonces me preparé para tu llegada, porque solo podría llegar a ese lugar con tu ayuda».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我并没有要求她把你带给我。不，这么做只会让我可怜的表妹怀疑自己，动摇她的决心。我只是告诉她，该去哪里寻找她的方舟世界的痕迹，我也只是回答了问题——这仅仅是在帮助我的亲族而已。在那之后，我便着手准备迎接你的到来。因为只有和你在一起，她才能来到那个地方。”
languages.original_text: "I did not ask her to hand you over to me — no, doing that would have made my poor cousin doubt herself even more than she was already. I simply told her where to seek out the traces of her craftworld, and the answers to her questions — a favour for a kinswoman, nothing more. And then I made ready for your arrival, for the only way she would reach that place was with you."

traits.locale_text: “我并没有要求她把你带给我。不，这么做只会让我可怜的表妹怀疑自己，动摇她的决心。我只是告诉她，该去哪里寻找她的方舟世界的痕迹，我也只是回答了问题——这仅仅是在帮助我的亲族而已。在那之后，我便着手准备迎接你的到来。因为只有和你在一起，她才能来到那个地方。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「お前を引き渡すようなど頼んじゃないさ。そんなことをしたら、あいつはこれまで以上に自信を失ってしまうだろう。俺はただ、方舟をどこで探せばよいのか、その答えを教えただけだ。親戚から聞かれたことに答えただけで、それ以上の意図はない。そして俺はお前の到着に備えた。なぜなら、あいつがあの地へ行くための唯一の方法は、お前と一緒にあることだからだ」
languages.original_text: "I did not ask her to hand you over to me — no, doing that would have made my poor cousin doubt herself even more than she was already. I simply told her where to seek out the traces of her craftworld, and the answers to her questions — a favour for a kinswoman, nothing more. And then I made ready for your arrival, for the only way she would reach that place was with you."

traits.locale_text: 「お前を引き渡すようなど頼んじゃないさ。そんなことをしたら、あいつはこれまで以上に自信を失ってしまうだろう。俺はただ、方舟をどこで探せばよいのか、その答えを教えただけだ。親戚から聞かれたことに答えただけで、それ以上の意図はない。そして俺はお前の到着に備えた。なぜなら、あいつがあの地へ行くための唯一の方法は、お前と一緒にあることだからだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne lui ai pas demandé de vous trahir ouvertement... non, ça n'aurait fait que décupler les doutes qui rongeaient déjà ma pauvre cousine de l'intérieur. Je lui ai seulement indiqué où chercher des traces de son vaisseau-monde, et les réponses à ses questions. Un service rendu à une lointaine parente, en somme. Ensuite, je me suis préparé à votre arrivée, conscient qu'elle ne pourrait pas atteindre cet endroit sans vous. »
languages.original_text: "I did not ask her to hand you over to me — no, doing that would have made my poor cousin doubt herself even more than she was already. I simply told her where to seek out the traces of her craftworld, and the answers to her questions — a favour for a kinswoman, nothing more. And then I made ready for your arrival, for the only way she would reach that place was with you."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne lui ai pas demandé de vous trahir ouvertement... non, ça n'aurait fait que décupler les doutes qui rongeaient déjà ma pauvre cousine de l'intérieur. Je lui ai seulement indiqué où chercher des traces de son vaisseau-monde, et les réponses à ses questions. Un service rendu à une lointaine parente, en somme. Ensuite, je me suis préparé à votre arrivée, conscient qu'elle ne pourrait pas atteindre cet endroit sans vous. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe sie nicht gebeten, Euch mir zu übergeben. Nein, dadurch hätte meine arme Base nur noch mehr Selbstzweifel bekommen, als sie sie ohnehin schon hatte. Ich habe ihr lediglich gesagt, wo sie nach den Spuren ihres Weltenschiffs suchen soll, und nach den Antworten auf ihre Fragen — ein Gefallen für eine Verwandte, mehr nicht. Und dann habe ich mich auf Eure Ankunft vorbereitet, denn sie konnte nur mit Eurer Hilfe an diesen Ort gelangen."
languages.original_text: "I did not ask her to hand you over to me — no, doing that would have made my poor cousin doubt herself even more than she was already. I simply told her where to seek out the traces of her craftworld, and the answers to her questions — a favour for a kinswoman, nothing more. And then I made ready for your arrival, for the only way she would reach that place was with you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe sie nicht gebeten, Euch mir zu übergeben. Nein, dadurch hätte meine arme Base nur noch mehr Selbstzweifel bekommen, als sie sie ohnehin schon hatte. Ich habe ihr lediglich gesagt, wo sie nach den Spuren ihres Weltenschiffs suchen soll, und nach den Antworten auf ihre Fragen — ein Gefallen für eine Verwandte, mehr nicht. Und dann habe ich mich auf Eure Ankunft vorbereitet, denn sie konnte nur mit Eurer Hilfe an diesen Ort gelangen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "I did not ask her to hand you over to me — no, doing that would have made my poor cousin doubt herself even more than she was already. I simply told her where to seek out the traces of her craftworld, and the answers to her questions — a favour for a kinswoman, nothing more. And then I made ready for your arrival, for the only way she would reach that place was with you."

languages.text: "Seni bana teslim etmesini istemedim gerçi... Öyle bir şey yapsam kendinden daha da şüphe ederdi zavallı. Yalnızca gemidünyasının izlerini... Sorularının cevaplarını nerede bulacağını söyledim. Soydaşıma bir güzellik yaptım anlayacağın. Sonra da senin gelişine hazırlandım. Çünkü oraya yalnızca seninle erişebilirdi."
languages.original_text: "I did not ask her to hand you over to me — no, doing that would have made my poor cousin doubt herself even more than she was already. I simply told her where to seek out the traces of her craftworld, and the answers to her questions — a favour for a kinswoman, nothing more. And then I made ready for your arrival, for the only way she would reach that place was with you."

traits.locale_text: "Seni bana teslim etmesini istemedim gerçi... Öyle bir şey yapsam kendinden daha da şüphe ederdi zavallı. Yalnızca gemidünyasının izlerini... Sorularının cevaplarını nerede bulacağını söyledim. Soydaşıma bir güzellik yaptım anlayacağın. Sonra da senin gelişine hazırlandım. Çünkü oraya yalnızca seninle erişebilirdi."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
